topics.body:
Remember about the document I said about an hour ago?

Well, my dad's PA printed it on some coloured paper.
While I was proofreading it, I noticed a hidden message on the paper, visible only when exposed to light. It made some shadowy outlining, becoming readable. After flipping the paper upside-down and stuff, the message was "conqueror".

And here, I'm just wondering why that was there to begin with.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
